title: Tailored Social Activity Suggestions for Enhanced Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend local events and social activities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Simple Communication Tools for Staying Connected with Family and Friends
summary: As an older adult, I want easy-to-use voice commands to initiate calls and video chats with my family and friends so that I can stay socially connected despite my reduced mobility.

title: Reminders for Staying Socially Active
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me of upcoming social events and activities so that I can stay connected with friends and community, despite my limited mobility.

title: Video Calling and Group Engagement Tools for Social Connection
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily initiate video calls and group chats with my family and friends using voice commands so that I can maintain my social connections despite my limited mobility.

title: Easy Event Discovery for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide personalized suggestions for local events and social activities so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Integration with Social Media for Enhanced Social Connectivity
summary: As an older adult, I want to connect with my family and friends through social media using ALFRED so that I can stay socially engaged and informed about their lives without the hassle of managing multiple apps.

title: Engagement Feedback for Social Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive feedback on my participation in social activities so that I can feel more connected and motivated to engage with my community.

title: Enhanced Accessibility for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to have accessible features that allow me to easily communicate and engage socially so that I can stay connected with my family and friends despite my mobility challenges.

title: Personalized Activity Recommendations for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and social activities that match my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged in my community.

title: Social Engagement and Community Connection Tools
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and facilitate easy communication with family and friends so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.
